modName: Deadly Serious Tutorial - Nifskope and Texture Transparency
summary: A brief tutorial on basic Nifskope use regarding Skyrim, and implementing texture transparency in meshes that previously did not possess it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/afqS9.png[/IMG][/center]

A brief tutorial on basic Nifskope use regarding Skyrim, and implementing texture transparency in meshes that previously did not possess it.

I wrote this because having such a resource at hand would\'ve saved me a lot of time spent doing research, asking a few people weird and probably poorly-phrased questions, and beating my head against a brick wall.

Enclosed is an image-heavy PDF with, hopefully, very clear and useful instructions!
author: doomfunk
